item.title: Tables & Data Visualizations
item.description: If Markdown tables are used to store data, why not directly visualizing it? LiaScript offers 10 different types of plots, the best type is automatically chosen, based on the format of a table and its values… but you are free to use your desired one ;-) You can use this this example as a basis for your own course by following this link … Or experiment with it in the LiveEditor below:
